sources.data_found: Grace Cluster: 200 A100 40GB, 18 RTX 6000, 32 T4, 30 A40
FASTER Cluster: 40 A100 40GB, 200 T4, 8 A10, 4 A30, 8 A40
ACES Cluster: 30 H100 PCIe, 4 A30, 1 GH200. ViDaL 2.0: 8 H100 NVL.

gpu_resources.notes: Includes DGX SuperPOD (760 H200), Grace (200 A100 40GB, 30 A40), FASTER (40 A100 40GB, 8 A40, 8 A10), ACES (30 H100 PCIe, 1 GH200), ViDaL 2.0 (8 H100 PCIe/NVL). Excluded T4s, RTX 6000s, A30s, and Ponte Vecchios.

analysis_notes: Manually corrected with specific cluster data including new DGX SuperPOD.
